questions: Does the image depict an open ancient book with yellowed pages? Answer with yes or no.

Is the book resting on a wooden table? Answer with yes or no.

Does the right page show a miniature scene with a courtyard and a blooming cherry blossom tree? Answer with yes or no.
Are there cherry blossom petals falling in the scene depicted on the right page? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a woman in a pink Hanfu standing on the grass in the miniature scene? Answer with yes or no.
Is the woman holding a broom and sweeping the fallen petals? Answer with yes or no.
Does the courtyard background include a traditional Chinese building with red pillars and blue tiles? Answer with yes or no.
Is the courtyard surrounded by small trees and rock decorations? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a faint halo around the pages enhancing the three-dimensional effect? Answer with yes or no.
Are there cherry blossom petals scattered on the table in front of the book? Answer with yes or no.
Is the background soft beige, creating an atmosphere full of ancient poetic charm and historical feel? Answer with yes or no.
Are the details exquisite and the colors soft, showcasing the weathered feel of the ancient book and the tranquil beauty of the courtyard? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes The image shows an open book with pages that appear aged due to their yellow tint.
yes The edges of the pages show wear and tear, indicative of age and use.
yes The book is placed on a surface that has the texture and appearance of wood.
yes The left page of the book contains numerous characters that resemble ancient script.

yes The visual elements suggest cherry blossoms are present with some petals appearing as if they are mid-fall.
yes In the miniature scene, a figure dressed in what can be interpreted as traditional attire stands near the tree.
yes The figure is positioned as if engaged in sweeping activity with flowers on the ground suggesting the presence of a broom.
yes There is a structure in the background with characteristics typical of traditional Chinese architecture.
yes The setting includes landscape elements consistent with a traditional garden design.
yes A subtle glow around the pages enhances the depth and realism of the scene.
yes There are visible petals on the wooden surface in front of the book.
yes The background color provides a neutral backdrop that complements the ancient and poetic theme.
